title: People of the rock
creator_credit: Clarke Da Prato, Nicholas Balla, Tim Wilson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film follows an Inuit family’s journey to the North Rankin nickel mine. How the hunters became bulldozer and machine operators is explained. Music by Robert Fleming.
creator_credit_for_label: Clarke Da Prato, Nicholas Balla, Tim Wilson and National Film Board of Canada
